dashboard.title: Welcome to AiLine
dashboard.subtitle: AI-powered inclusive education platform
dashboard.create_plan_hint: Generate a new inclusive study plan
dashboard.empty_hint: Create an AI-powered inclusive study plan in minutes

demo.title: Guided Demo
demo.description: Experience AiLine in 2 minutes — see AI-powered inclusive education in action

form.prompt_placeholder: E.g. Lesson plan on photosynthesis for 6th graders with ASD adaptations
form.subject: Subject

wizard.profile_description: Select the accessibility profile for the study plan.

pipeline.title: Generation Pipeline
pipeline.no_events: No events received yet. Start generation to see the pipeline in action.

exports.title: Plan Exports
exports.description: Compare the standard version with AI-generated accessible variants.
exports.no_plan: No plan selected. Select a plan to view its exports.

accessibility.page_description: Customize the experience for different learning needs. Switch between personas, compare adapted versions, and simulate conditions to understand your students' perspective.
accessibility.persona_description: Select a persona to adjust the platform's visual theme.
accessibility.twin_description: Compare the original plan with the adapted version. Differences are highlighted with colors and visual indicators.
accessibility.title: Accessibility Preferences

theme_hints.high-contrast: Maximum contrast, large targets, bold text
theme_hints.tea: Calm colors, predictable layout, no surprise elements
theme_hints.low-vision: Extra-large text, bold weight, high contrast
theme_hints.hearing: Visual indicators for all audio cues

accessibility.cognitive_description: Monitor the cognitive complexity of generated content. Our 3-factor heuristic evaluates UI density, reading level, and interaction count.

sign_language.title: Sign Language
sign_language.subtitle: Libras gesture recognition and VLibras translation
sign_language.no_result: Capture a gesture to see the result.
sign_language.gestures_note: MVP: 4 basic Libras gestures (hello, thank you, yes, no).
sign_language.vlibras_description: The VLibras widget translates selected text on the page into Brazilian Sign Language (Libras) using a 3D avatar. Select any text on the page to see the translation.
sign_language.error_not_allowed: Camera access denied. Check your browser permissions.
sign_language.error_not_supported: Video capture not supported in this browser.
sign_language.captioning_description: Real-time translation of Libras signs to Portuguese text.
sign_language.captioning_no_signs: No signs detected yet. Start captioning and sign in front of the camera.

landing.hero_subtitle: AI-powered education that adapts to EVERY learner
landing.hero_full_name: Adaptive Inclusive Learning: Individual Needs in Education
landing.badge_built_with: Built with Claude Code | Powered by Opus 4.6
landing.feature_pipeline_desc: Glass Box transparency shows every step of the AI decision process in real time
landing.feature_accessibility_desc: 9 personas including ASD, ADHD, Dyslexia, Low Vision, and Sign Language support
landing.feature_sign_desc: Real-time Libras gesture recognition with MediaPipe and VLibras avatar translation
landing.feature_curriculum_desc: Automatic alignment with BNCC, Common Core, and NGSS standards
landing.feature_tutor_desc: Socratic method tutoring with adaptive difficulty and multi-model intelligence
landing.feature_models_desc: Smart routing across Claude, GPT, and Gemini for optimal quality and cost
landing.how_step_1_desc: Log in as Teacher, Student, or Parent to see the platform from their perspective
landing.how_step_2_desc: Teachers create AI-powered inclusive lesson plans. Students see adapted versions.
landing.how_step_3_desc: Content automatically adapts for autism, ADHD, dyslexia, visual and hearing needs
landing.how_step_4_desc: Monitor progress, review AI decisions, and maintain full control
landing.demo_subtitle: Choose a profile to experience AiLine from different perspectives. Each role shows different features and accessibility adaptations.
landing.demo_teacher_detail: 5th Grade Science, Lincoln Elementary, Austin TX
landing.demo_teacher_desc: Experience creating inclusive lesson plans with AI-powered adaptations
landing.demo_alex_desc: See how content adapts for autism spectrum with calm colors and predictable layouts
landing.demo_maya_desc: Experience focus mode, chunked activities, and reduced distractions
landing.demo_lucas_desc: Try bionic reading, wide spacing, and warm tones optimized for dyslexia
landing.demo_sofia_desc: See sign language support, captions, and visual indicators for audio cues
landing.demo_parent_desc: View your child's progress, AI-generated reports, and mastery tracking

session.no_standards: No curriculum standards aligned to this plan.
session.micro_assessment_desc: Create a quick check on {topic} to gauge understanding
session.next_topic_desc: Advance to the next topic for {grade} {subject}

tutor.title: AI Tutor
tutor.subtitle: Chat with the AI tutor for personalized help
tutor.welcome_title: How can I help you learn?
tutor.welcome_description: Ask me anything about your studies. I can explain concepts, solve problems step by step, and create visual diagrams. You can also use voice input!
tutor.no_session_review: Start a chat session to review the conversation.

simulate.title: Empathy Bridge
simulate.description: Simulate how your students experience the content. Activate one or more simulations to understand their perspectives.
simulate.active_simulations: {count} simulation(s) active. The page may look different than normal.

modes.protanopia_desc: Difficulty distinguishing red from green. Affects ~1% of males. Red appears as yellowish-green.
modes.deuteranopia_desc: Most common form of color blindness. Affects ~6% of males. Green is confused with red.
modes.tritanopia_desc: Difficulty distinguishing blue from yellow. Rare (~0.01%). Blue appears as green.
modes.low_vision_desc: Simulates blurred vision and reduced contrast, as experienced by people with macular degeneration.
modes.tunnel_vision_desc: Visual field restricted to the center, as experienced by people with glaucoma or retinitis pigmentosa.
modes.dyslexia_desc: Scrambled letters simulate reading difficulty. Affects ~5-10% of the population.
modes.motor_difficulty_desc: Cursor delay simulates tremor and fine motor control difficulty.

export_viewer.no_content: No content available for this variant.

personas.high_contrast_desc: High contrast colors for better readability
personas.dyslexia_desc: Fonts and spacing optimized for dyslexia
personas.hearing_desc: Emphasis on visual content and captions
personas.motor_desc: Enlarged touch areas and simplified navigation

export_variants.low_distraction_desc: Simplified layout with fewer visual elements
export_variants.high_contrast_desc: High contrast colors for better readability
export_variants.dyslexia_friendly_desc: Fonts and spacing optimized for dyslexia
export_variants.screen_reader_desc: Semantic structure optimized for screen readers

observability.title: Observability Dashboard
observability.description: Real-time monitoring of LLM providers, latency, errors, and resource usage.

degradation.title: System Resilience Demo
degradation.description: Simulate infrastructure failures to see how the system gracefully degrades.
degradation.redis_down: Redis unavailable - using in-memory cache fallback
degradation.banner_degraded: Running in degraded mode. Some features may use cached data.

privacy.title: Privacy & Data
privacy.description: Review what data is stored, retention policies, and manage your data.
privacy.export_description: Download a copy of all your stored data
privacy.delete_confirm: Are you sure? This action cannot be undone.

cognitive_load.title: Cognitive Load
cognitive_load.suggestion_low: Content complexity is appropriate for the learner.
cognitive_load.suggestion_medium: Consider simplifying visuals or reducing active elements.
cognitive_load.suggestion_high: Reduce content density or switch to a simpler accessibility persona.

progress.title: Student Progress
progress.empty_description: Record student progress after tutor sessions to see mastery tracking here.

review.title: Plan Review
review.empty_description: Plans will appear here after generation for your approval.

trust.title: Trust & Transparency
trust.no_data: Generate a plan to see trust metrics

common.error_description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or go back to the home page.
common.sse_reconnect_failed: Could not reconnect. Please try again.
common.not_found_description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

pwa.install_description: Access offline and get a native experience

vlibras.help_text: VLibras: select text on the page to translate into Libras. Programmatic translation is not available via the widget JS API.
